sentences.sContent: The device was able to desiccate the salty water and to condense the moisture into drinkable water.
sentences.sContent_eng: The device was able to desiccate the salty water and to condense the moisture into drinkable water.
sentences.sCn: 这个装置能先把盐水蒸干，再让水蒸气冷凝成可饮用的水。

sentences.sContent: Although many bdelloids live in desiccation-prone habitats, such as ephemeral ponds, there are substantial numbers found in permanently aquatic habitats that are unable to desiccate.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although many bdelloids live in desiccation-prone habitats, such as ephemeral ponds, there are substantial numbers found in permanently aquatic habitats that are unable to desiccate.
sentences.sCn: 尽管许多轮虫生活在干燥的栖息地，如短时间的小水塘，但是有许多轮虫却生活在不会干涸的多水环境里。

sentences.sContent: Tympanic center leaves the alveolus of one desiccate.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tympanic center leaves the alveolus of one desiccate.
sentences.sCn: 鼓膜中心则留下一变干的小孔。
